title: What is so special about Brilliant Pala classes that thousands of students have joined there? How is it different from P.C. Thomas classes? - Quora

response.answer_text: Brilliant pala supports you throughout your journey. They have excellent teachers. They do not blame you. They know that you are already under pressure and they support you. You have your freedom, supportive class teachers with whom you can discuss anything, 4 pillars who are very helpful, a good library, coin boxes to call home. While most of those who have studied in prof. PC Thomas compare the institution to a jail.

I currently study at Prof.P.C.Thomas Classes(main center in thrissur) as a sunday scholar.Its true that Brilliant Pala has better results than the P.C.But according to me,a student who works hard enough to succeed can certainly bring out flying colours. In my opinion,the teachers for our batch are perfect.We are also allowed to give our feedbacks about the classes to Prof.P.C.Thomas sir and he is available when we students need them… I dont know what is that ‘difference’ from Brilliant Pala…But i love our teachers and their classes at P.C.Thomas Classes….;)
